name: Car Driving & Parking Academy
description:
Road signs and driving made simpler – just for you! Enroll in this virtual school of driving called the Car Driving & Parking Academy 2018 Simulator, and master your driving and parking skills.

 In this game are presented cars of the German manufacturers: from classic city cars to powerful modern sports cars and luxury cars. Each car in the game has it's own technical specifications and engine sounds. Well detailed body and dashboard create the effect of full presence and realism.

We bring to you the ultimate driving simulator, in which you’ve to now drive and follow all the road signs. Don’t take the wrong turns, follow the signals, wear the seat belt – it’s your one stop to becoming a perfect driver.

Features: 
- Modern beautiful graphics;
 - Realistic car physics; 
- Change the time of day in real-time; 
- Qualitatively modeled German cars;
